duties_responsibilities.duty: Survey and evaluate existing structures for maintenance and repair needs.
Prepare and issue associated inspection reports for use by the customer and Territory Manager.
Communicate assessments and follow-up plans with Territory Manager.
Engineer all structural repairs within the assigned territory.
Review calculations, structural drawings, and construction documents.
Research building codes and specifications as required.
Provide technical sales support to Business Development Representatives for prospective customers and existing clients.
Provide technical advice and guidance to project personnel and subcontractors.
Consistently attend technical seminars and training programs to ensure subject matter expertise is up-to-date.
Assist with training new Structural Engineers as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Civil/Structural Engineering, P.E. preferred
